\begingroup
% Test whether we received one or two arguments
\def\testengine#1#2!{\def\secondarg{#2}}
% That's Tau (as in Taco or ΤΕΧ, Tau-Epsilon-Chi), a 2-byte UTF-8 character
\testengine Τ!\relax
% Unicode-aware engine (such as XeTeX or LuaTeX) only sees a single (2-byte) argument
\ifx\secondarg\empty
    \message{UTF-8 Persian hyphenation patterns (v0.001, 2008/19/15)}
    % Set \lccode for ZWNJ and ZWJ.
    \lccode"200C="200C
    \lccode"200D="200D
    \input hyph-fa.tex
\else
    \message{No Persian hyphenation patterns (v0.001, 2008/19/15) - only available with Unicode engines}
    \input zerohyph.tex
\fi
\endgroup
